trans-unit.id: Failed to fill web page because script could not be evaluated
trans-unit.source: Failed to fill web page because script could not be evaluated
trans-unit.target: Die Webseite konnte wegen der fehlgeschlagenen Evaluierung des Skripts nicht ausgefüllt werden.
trans-unit.note: 1Password Extension Error Message

trans-unit.id: Failed to fill web page because script is missing
trans-unit.source: Failed to fill web page because script is missing
trans-unit.target: Die Webseite konnte wegen des fehlenden Skripts nicht ausgefüllt werden.
trans-unit.note: 1Password Extension Error Message

trans-unit.id: Failed to obtain URL String from web view. The web view must be loaded completely when calling the 1Password Extension
trans-unit.source: Failed to obtain URL String from web view. The web view must be loaded completely when calling the 1Password Extension
trans-unit.target: Der Adress-String konnte nicht aus der Web-Ansicht übernommen werden. Die Web-Ansicht muss vollständig geladen sein, wenn die 1Password-Erweiterung aufgerufen wird.
trans-unit.note: 1Password Extension Error Message

trans-unit.id: Failed to parse information returned by 1Password Extension
trans-unit.source: Failed to parse information returned by 1Password Extension
trans-unit.target: Die an die 1Password-Erweiterung zurückgelieferten Informationen konnten nicht verarbeitet werden.
trans-unit.note: 1Password Extension Error Message
Setting for closing private tabs

trans-unit.id: Firefox won't remember any of your history or cookies, but new bookmarks will be saved.
trans-unit.source: Firefox won't remember any of your history or cookies, but new bookmarks will be saved.
trans-unit.target: Firefox wird weder Chronik noch Cookies speichern. Neue Lesezeichen können jedoch gespeichert werden.
trans-unit.note: Description text displayed when there are no open tabs while in private mode
Text button displayed when there are no tabs open while in private mode
Toggled OFF accessibility value
Toggled ON accessibility value
Context menu option for opening a link in a new private tab
Title displayed for when there are no open tabs while in private mode
Accessibility label for toggling on/off private mode

trans-unit.id: Turns private mode on or off
trans-unit.source: Turns private mode on or off
trans-unit.target: Schaltet den privaten Modus an oder aus
trans-unit.note: Accessiblity hint for toggling on/off private mode
Will be displayed in Settings under 'Close Private Tabs'
Label for search engine buttons. The argument corresponds to the name of the search engine.
For search suggestions prompt. This string should be short so it fits nicely on the prompt row.
Label for search settings button.

Accessibility label for image of default search engine displayed left to the actual search suggestions from the engine. The parameter substituted for \"%@\" is the name of the search engine. E.g.: Search suggestions from Google
Prompt shown before enabling provider search queries
For search suggestions prompt. This string should be short so it fits nicely on the prompt row.
See http://bit.ly/1SmEXU1
See http://bit.ly/1SmEXU1
Header for the list of devices table
Close button in top navigation bar

trans-unit.id: Please open Firefox, go to Settings and sign in to continue.
trans-unit.source: Please open Firefox, go to Settings and sign in to continue.
trans-unit.target: Bitte starten Sie Firefox, öffnen Sie die Einstellungen und melden Sie sich an, um fortzufahren.
trans-unit.note: See http://mzl.la/1ISlXnU
Navigation bar button to Send the current page to a device
Title of the dialog that allows you to send a tab to a different device

trans-unit.id: You are not signed in to your Firefox Account.
trans-unit.source: You are not signed in to your Firefox Account.
trans-unit.target: Sie sind nicht mit Ihrem Firefox-Konto angemeldet.
trans-unit.note: See http://mzl.la/1ISlXnU

trans-unit.id: You don't have any other devices connected to this Firefox Account available to sync.
trans-unit.source: You don't have any other devices connected to this Firefox Account available to sync.
trans-unit.target: Mit diesem Firefox-Konto sind keine Ihrer anderen Geräte verbunden, mit denen synchronisiert werden könnte.
trans-unit.note: Error message shown in the remote tabs panel
Add button in the share dialog
On/off toggle to select adding this url to your bookmarks
On/off toggle to select adding this url to your reading list
A brief descriptive name for this app on this device, used for Send Tab and Synced Tabs. The first argument is the app name. The second argument is the device name.
The name of the folder that contains desktop bookmarks in the menu. This should match bookmarks.folder.menu.label on Android.
The name of the folder that contains desktop bookmarks in the toolbar. This should match bookmarks.folder.toolbar.label on Android.
The title of the folder that contains mobile bookmarks. This should match bookmarks.folder.mobile.label on Android.
The name of the folder that contains unsorted desktop bookmarks. This should match bookmarks.folder.unfiled.label on Android.
The default name for bookmark folders without titles. The default name for bookmark nodes without titles.
